name: Portfolio
description: this is my relishable website. i really like relish.
author: Nate Duffy <nate.duffy@gmail.com>

scripts.scss: mkdir -p dist/css && node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/css ass/sass && echo 'XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX'
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs ass/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/main.js && uglifyjs ass/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/main.min.js && echo 'OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO'
scripts.icons: svgo -f ass/images/icons && mkdir -p dist/images && svg-sprite-generate -d ass/images/icons -o dist/images/icons.svg
scripts.build:css: yarn run scss && yarn run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: yarn run lint && yarn run uglify
scripts.build:images: yarn run imagemin && yarn run icons
scripts.build:all: yarn run build:css && yarn run build:js && yarn run build:images
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'yarn run serve' 'yarn run watch:css' 'yarn run watch:js'
